pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, to which of the four kinds of legal issues do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.2: They belong to legal issues arising from an offense. …
pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.1: When it comes to the offense for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, to which of the four kinds of legal issues does it belong?
pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.2: It belongs to legal issues arising from an offense.
pli-tv-pvr1.6:3.1: The sixth section on legal issues is finished.
